text.text_translated:
The Hunger Games is a story about the future. In the story, North America is gone. The new country's name is Panem.

A district is a part of a country. Panem has twelve poor districts. The Capitol is the name of the rich city that rules the country. The Capitol has all the power.

Each district makes different things for the Capitol. The story starts in District 12. This district makes all the coal for the country. Coal is a black rock used for energy.

In the past, there was another district. It was District 13. The people of District 13 fought against the Capitol. So the Capitol destroyed it.
